• Localized in French, German, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Chinese, and Japanese
• Fixes a bug preventing restoring purchases from working correctly
• Other bug fixes and stability improvements

• Cinamatic now supports capturing full resolution (HD) and 4K video (on supported devices)
• Support for capturing in 16:9 portrait orientation (perfect for Instagram Stories or other social media video platforms)
• New 'Beard' film cartridge, designed by photographer Luke Beard
• Fixes some bugs associated with importing certain types of video
• Fixes a bug that could cause a crash when leaving the camera on iOS 9
